Name: Embracing Darkness
About the game: 'Embracing Darkness' is a fan visual novel in which players can enjoy a short encounter with Local Villains Tiefedorf and Shuraomaru in the form of an interactive fiction story. FEATURES Japanese & English languages available 3 scenarios Non-gendered protagonist that can be read as either male or female Completely free STORY Shuraomaru's story Every day, you get lunch at your favorite caf√©, and you sit down at your favorite table to eat. This time, however, there's someone already on your seat when you get there, and he seems to be waiting for you... Tiefedorf's story After getting lost in the woods during a winter storm, you end up at a mysterious mansion. With nowhere else to turn to, you find yourself accepting the invitation of its owner to stay for tea... Bonus Scenario Ever since you inherited your grandfather's mystic shop, you've been used to dealing with all kinds of phantoms and shady figures. But there's something about two of your newest clients you can't quite put your finger on..
